title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

"Defund the police" policies come home to roost. Holiday weekend in Chicago, over 100 shot! Shooting epidemic in blue cities. Democrats try to blame Republicans for the defund the police movement. Windy City Mayor, Lori Lightfoot says there's no rise in crime, and it's racist to question her. Woke white people are the enemies of this country. Recap of the ESPN Diversity Kerfuffle.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
